overview: „Cycling Across Mongolia“ – is a documentary adventure film about six people cycling in the country, which has lowest population density on Earth. This country is immense and lies firmy within the top 20 biggest countries of the wolrd, by land mass, however, it only has 3 million people living in it. Cyclists had days, within this vast country, when they met noone. They arrived in the first town only on the third week of the trip. Cell connection?.. What cell connection?..
title: Cycling Across Mongolia
